Time'' Rugrats'' is returning with TV episodes and a movie. ( Photo : Nickelodeon ) Reptar fans, rejoice : The beloved cartoon ` ` Rugrats'' is coming back. Nickelodeon and Paramount Pictures announced Monday that 26 ` ` Rugrats'' episodes are on the way ( the release date hasn't been announced ) and a live - action ` ` Rugrats'' movie with CGI characters will be out Nov. 13, 2020.
